query.statement: SELECT A.RECIPE_CD, A.RECIPE_NAME, B.ITEM_CODE, (SELECT ITEM_NAME FROM HLDC_PO_ITEM_MST WHERE ITEM_CODE=B.ITEM_CODE) ITEM_NAME, C.DISUSE_RATE,B.NEED_QTY,B.ITEM_SEQ, --ROUND((CAL * B.NEED_QTY / 100),2) "¿­·®", ROUND( NVL(C.CAL,0) * DECODE( NVL(C.DISUSE_RATE,0), 0, B.NEED_QTY, ROUND(B.NEED_QTY*(100-C.DISUSE_RATE)/100,2) ) / 100,2) "¿­·®", --ROUND((WATER * B.NEED_QTY / 100),2) "¼öºÐ", ROUND( NVL(C.WATER,0) * DECODE( NVL(C.DISUSE_RATE,0), 0, B.NEED_QTY, ROUND(B.NEED_QTY*(100-C.DISUSE_RATE)/100,2) ) / 100,2) "¼öºÐ", --ROUND((PROT * B.NEED_QTY / 100),2) "´Ü¹éÁú", ROUND( NVL(C.PROT,0) * DECODE( NVL(C.DISUSE_RATE,0), 0, B.NEED_QTY, ROUND(B.NEED_QTY*(100-C.DISUSE_RATE)/100,2) ) / 100,2) "´Ü¹éÁú", --ROUND((FAT * B.NEED_QTY / 100),2) "ÁöÁú", ROUND( NVL(C.FAT,0) * DECODE( NVL(C.DISUSE_RATE,0), 0, B.NEED_QTY, ROUND(B.NEED_QTY*(100-C.DISUSE_RATE)/100,2) ) / 100,2) "ÁöÁú", --ROUND((CARBO * B.NEED_QTY / 100),2) "´çÁú", ROUND( NVL(C.CARBO,0) * DECODE( NVL(C.DISUSE_RATE,0), 0, B.NEED_QTY, ROUND(B.NEED_QTY*(100-C.DISUSE_RATE)/100,2) ) / 100,2) "´çÁú", --ROUND((FIBER * B.NEED_QTY / 100),2) "¼¶À¯", ROUND( NVL(C.FIBER,0) * DECODE( NVL(C.DISUSE_RATE,0), 0, B.NEED_QTY, ROUND(B.NEED_QTY*(100-C.DISUSE_RATE)/100,2) ) / 100,2) "¼¶À¯", --ROUND((ASH * B.NEED_QTY / 100),2) "È¸ºÐ", ROUND( NVL(C.ASH,0) * DECODE( NVL(C.DISUSE_RATE,0), 0, B.NEED_QTY, ROUND(B.NEED_QTY*(100-C.DISUSE_RATE)/100,2) ) / 100,2) "È¸ºÐ", --ROUND((CA * B.NEED_QTY / 100),2) "Ä®½·", ROUND( NVL(C.CA,0) * DECODE( NVL(C.DISUSE_RATE,0), 0, B.NEED_QTY, ROUND(B.NEED_QTY*(100-C.DISUSE_RATE)/100,2) ) / 100,2) "Ä®½·", --ROUND((P * B.NEED_QTY / 100),2) "ÀÎ", ROUND( NVL(C.P,0) * DECODE( NVL(C.DISUSE_RATE,0), 0, B.NEED_QTY, ROUND(B.NEED_QTY*(100-C.DISUSE_RATE)/100,2) ) / 100,2) "ÀÎ", --ROUND((FE * B.NEED_QTY / 100),2) "Ã¶", ROUND( NVL(C.FE,0) * DECODE( NVL(C.DISUSE_RATE,0), 0, B.NEED_QTY, ROUND(B.NEED_QTY*(100-C.DISUSE_RATE)/100,2) ) / 100,2) "Ã¶", --ROUND((NA * B.NEED_QTY / 100),2) "³ªÆ®·ý", ROUND( NVL(C.NA,0) * DECODE( NVL(C.DISUSE_RATE,0), 0, B.NEED_QTY, ROUND(B.NEED_QTY*(100-C.DISUSE_RATE)/100,2) ) / 100,2) "³ªÆ®·ý", --ROUND((K * B.NEED_QTY / 100),2) "Ä®·ý", ROUND( NVL(C.K,0) * DECODE( NVL(C.DISUSE_RATE,0), 0, B.NEED_QTY, ROUND(B.NEED_QTY*(100-C.DISUSE_RATE)/100,2) ) / 100,2) "Ä®·ý", --ROUND((VITA_A * B.NEED_QTY / 100),2) "ºñÅ¸¹ÎA", ROUND( NVL(C.VITA_A,0) * DECODE( NVL(C.DISUSE_RATE,0), 0, B.NEED_QTY, ROUND(B.NEED_QTY*(100-C.DISUSE_RATE)/100,2) ) / 100,2) "ºñÅ¸¹ÎA", --ROUND((RETIN * B.NEED_QTY / 100),2) "·¹Æ¼³î", ROUND( NVL(C.RETIN,0) * DECODE( NVL(C.DISUSE_RATE,0), 0, B.NEED_QTY, ROUND(B.NEED_QTY*(100-C.DISUSE_RATE)/100,2) ) / 100,2) "·¹Æ¼³î", --ROUND((B_CAROT * B.NEED_QTY / 100),2) "B_Ä«¸£Æ¾", ROUND( NVL(C.B_CAROT,0) * DECODE( NVL(C.DISUSE_RATE,0), 0, B.NEED_QTY, ROUND(B.NEED_QTY*(100-C.DISUSE_RATE)/100,2) ) / 100,2) "B_Ä«¸£Æ¾", --ROUND((THIA * B.NEED_QTY / 100),2) "ºñÅ¸¹ÎB1", ROUND( NVL(C.THIA,0) * DECODE( NVL(C.DISUSE_RATE,0), 0, B.NEED_QTY, ROUND(B.NEED_QTY*(100-C.DISUSE_RATE)/100,2) ) / 100,2) "ºñÅ¸¹ÎB1", --ROUND((RIBO * B.NEED_QTY / 100),2) "ºñÅ¸¹ÎB2", ROUND( NVL(C.RIBO,0) * DECODE( NVL(C.DISUSE_RATE,0), 0, B.NEED_QTY, ROUND(B.NEED_QTY*(100-C.DISUSE_RATE)/100,2) ) / 100,2) "ºñÅ¸¹ÎB2", --ROUND((NIACIN * B.NEED_QTY / 100),2) "³ªÀÌ¾Æ½Å", ROUND( NVL(C.NIACIN,0) * DECODE( NVL(C.DISUSE_RATE,0), 0, B.NEED_QTY, ROUND(B.NEED_QTY*(100-C.DISUSE_RATE)/100,2) ) / 100,2) "³ªÀÌ¾Æ½Å", --ROUND((VITA_C * B.NEED_QTY / 100),2) "ºñÅ¸¹ÎC", ROUND( NVL(C.VITA_C,0) * DECODE( NVL(C.DISUSE_RATE,0), 0, B.NEED_QTY, ROUND(B.NEED_QTY*(100-C.DISUSE_RATE)/100,2) ) / 100,2) "ºñÅ¸¹ÎC", --ROUND((CHOLE * B.NEED_QTY / 100),2) "ÄÝ·¹½ºÅ×·Ñ" ROUND( NVL(C.CHOLE,0) * DECODE( NVL(C.DISUSE_RATE,0), 0, B.NEED_QTY, ROUND(B.NEED_QTY*(100-C.DISUSE_RATE)/100,2) ) / 100,2) "ÄÝ·¹½ºÅ×·Ñ" FROM FSR_STD_RECIPE_MST A , FSR_STD_RECIPE_ITEM B , FSI_ITEM_NUT C WHERE A.RECIPE_CD = B.RECIPE_CD AND B.ITEM_CODE = C.ITEM_CODE AND A.RECIPE_CD = #RECIPE_CD# ORDER BY A.RECIPE_CD,B.ITEM_SEQ
